name: SuperJumpWorld Rage
description:
Remember Super Mario Bros?

Okay so this is game is pretty like the same, but with a twist.

Hope you'll find a way out of this place...

Features


  • Choose your character between 2 colors
  • Play through 9 levels over 2 maps
  • Avoid as many obstacles as possible
  • Play with a friend on the same screen
  • Create your own levels with the built in level editor

Choose your style

Select the player you want to play with.


Red                      Blue

                  

Go through 2 maps

Travel over 2 maps composed in a total of 9 levels with more

obstacles than you could except.

Invite a friend to join you

Play with a friend on the same screen at home or with

the Steam Remote Play Together.

Let's see some of the things you could encounter during your journey



Spikes



Rock



Knife

Express yourself with the map editor

Create your own level of SuperJumpWorld Rage and play or

share it with your friend to see their anger.
